question: Cell membranes contain some biochemicals which are responsible for cell recognition and adhesion. They are _________ ?
explanation: Cell membranes contain some biochemicals which are responsible for cell recognition and adhesion. They are glycoproteins and glycolipids. Lipid and proteins on the cell membrane surface often have short carbohydrate chains protruding out from the cell surface which are known as glycolipids and glycoproteins.
